comment.author: 41098896@N00
comment._content: Looks like a male catcher. Anybody know if that was typical? Maybe it wouldn't be appropriate for the ladies to squat? Or were they playing a male team?

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Well, the catcher is one of the NY Giants catchers.  I suspect this was some sort of exhibition game which is why I said I wondered how bad they got beat by the real Giants.
